verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:12
verses.text: So the Lord alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:13
verses.text: He made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields; and he made him to suck honey out of the rock, and oil out of the flinty rock;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:14
verses.text: Butter of kine, and milk of sheep, with fat of lambs, and rams of the breed of Bashan, and goats, with the fat of kidneys of wheat; and thou didst drink the pure blood of the grape.
